general_advisory: Lowering of temperature may favor incidences of post flowering diseases like false smut. So, farmers are requested to be vigilant and take need based control measures. Go for pruning and manuring of rose.

advisory: Farmers are advised to harvest and safe storage of early planted rice which have already attended 85% maturity level due to upcoming rainy condition on Wednesday and Thursday. Light rainfall is expected on Wednesday and Thursday, don't apply any sort of pesticide.

In present weather conditions, rouging of viral infested crop should be done in chilli and tomato. Infected plants should be uprooted and buried in the soil. If infection is more than spray of imidacloprid @ 0.3 ml per litre of water is advised for control the vector. (go for application on rainless day)
Due to decrease in temperature the growth of fish will be slow. So, farmers can reduce the amount of fish feed.
